1.title: Voluntourism
1.plot: Recently married Sonia and Lennox are concerned about their impending retirement and are looking for ways to stay active, engaged and to not "waste away". The couple travel to Lobitos, a remote village on the Peruvian coast. There they work with a local community group to teach children to surf, speak English and become community leaders. The couple find out how this kind of "voluntourism" can give them purpose in their later years.

2.title: Silicone Valley and the Blue Zone
2.plot: Husbands Ian and Leon discuss the future of longevity technology and genetic research in Silicon Valley with the infamous bio-tech renegade Aubrey DeGrey. Ian and Leon then drive a classic car down the Pacific Coast Highway and into the desert to the 7th Day Adventist community of Loma Linda to learn about "Blue Zones" and how anyone can make simple lifestyle changes that would allow them to live radically longer lives.

3.title: Fountains of Youth
3.plot: Best Friends Vivian and Shirley swim with dolphins in what are purported to be sacred waters, visit the real site of the Fountain of Youth and learn about the history of humanity's quest for immortality.

4.title: Love, Sex and Ageing
4.plot: Unconventional couple Taimi and Haldun meet with a sex therapist in order to expand their physical and romantic connection. They then travel to the Cap d'Agde in the south of France to visit a nudist colony and a swingers resort after meeting with France's leading expert on sex and ageing.

5.title: Exercise
5.plot: Lily and Oren visit a cutting edge lab at McMaster University in Hamilton, Canada to learn how exercise can stop aging. Then they travel to a luxury resort in the Austrian Alps to undergo a rigorous training regimen designed to keep their bodies and minds young and strong.

imdb.plot outline: Five couples embark on journeys as unique as they are, each one designed to extend and explore the limits of aging and ultimately, to keep them young. We'll join them as they reveal the secrets of bio-tech research centres in Silicon Valley, swim with dolphins at the historic site of the fountain of youth, divine the tantric arts on the beaches of Cap d'Agde, learn the life-giving power of community as they surf the coast of Peru and push their bodies to the limits of endurance in the Austrian Alps. From highfalutin, to folksy, to just plain flakey, each trip will challenge the voyaging couple to transform themselves and everything we think we know about aging.
imdb.title: Longevity Road Trip
